meanings.definition: Achieving maximum productivity with minimum wasted effort or expense.
meanings.sent1: The new machine is very efficient at saving energy.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her efficient time management skills.
meanings.sent3: The robot was so efficient that it finished all the work in half the time!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an efficient computer, processing information quickly.
meanings.sent5: The efficient use of resources made the project successful.

meanings.definition: Acting or producing effectively with a minimum of waste, expense, or unnecessary effort.
meanings.sent1: The efficient design of the car allowed it to use less fuel.
meanings.sent2: The team worked efficiently to complete the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The efficient vacuum cleaner sucked up all the dirt in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her efficient cooking skills made dinner preparation a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The efficient use of space in the room made it feel larger.

meanings.definition: Performing or functioning in the best possible manner with the least waste of time and effort.
meanings.sent1: The efficient use of technology improved the company's operations.
meanings.sent2: The efficient employee always finished tasks before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The efficient cat caught the mouse in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her efficient decision-making skills helped her in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The efficient workflow streamlined the production process.
